content: kakano hat designed by francoise danoy about needle us size 5 3 75mm 16 40cm circular needle us size 6 4mm 16 40cm circular needle and us size 6 4mm dpns a long circular needle such as a 32 can also be used to work the magic-loop method yarns used yoth yarns big sister dk / 8 ply 80% merino 10% nylon 10% cashmere 231 yards / 100 grams 1 skein in mango yardage 200 - 231 yards gauge 20 sts and 28 row = 4 in/10cm in textured diamond st pattern in larger needle in the round take the time to swatch for gauge including blocking especially if using yoth yoth is a very soft and elastic yarn and blooms quite a bit when wet other notions stitch markers darning needle final measurements length 9 23 cm / circumference 19-20 48-50 cm 19-20 48-50cm copyright @ 2016 all rights reserved kakano hat 9 23 cm stitch abbreviations k - knit round s - round s p - purl repeat - repeat cdd - central double decrease st s - stitch es co - cast on pattern notes when working the first cdd stitch on the decrease round slip the last stitch worked on the previous round back onto the left needle removing the stitch marker for the beginning of the round and placing it after the slipped stitch then you can work the cdd decrease for high-res images of the hat video tutorials of special stitches and how to block hats visit www arohaknits com/ kakano-hat pattern stitches textured diamond stitch 8 sts round 3 k5 p2 k1 p2 k4 round 4 k4 p2 k3 x 2 round 1 p1 k7 round 5 cdd k1 p2 k5 p2 k1 12 sts round 2 p2 k5 p1 round 6 k1 p2 k7 p2 round 3 k1 p2 k3 p2 round 7 k2 p2 k5 p2 k1 round 4 k2 p2 k1 x 2 round 8 cdd k1 p2 k3 p2 k1 10 sts round 5 k3 p3 k2 round 9 k3 p2 k1 p2 k2 round 6 k4 p1 k3 round 10 k4 p3 k3 round 7 repeat round 5 round 11 cdd k3 p1 k3 8 sts round 8 repeat round 4 rnds 12 -
